document_data.mainbody:
Brianna was a barmaid who worked in the Cracked Tankard tavern in the Crows End district of Ravens Bluff in the mid-to-late-14 century DR.
Circa the , Brianna worked the tables of Relfin Tagorlads establishment alongside two other barmaids â€“ Ardanna and Torianne. They kept an eye on the suspicious customers and were useful to a group of the Living City adventurers, informing them of suspicious Zhentarim-type mercenaries who had recently been seen at the Tankard. Brianna also stated that the Crows End district had been in decline of late, with many businesses closing due to the lack of city guard patrols.
